title.rendered: Financial Commission Launches Financial Commissioner Facebook Group to Promote Networking, Education and Market Knowledge Amongst Retail FX Traders

content.rendered:
October 24,  2018, The Financial Commission, a leading independent member-driven external dispute resolution (EDR) organization for international online brokerages that participate in global foreign exchange (forex), derivatives, and CFD markets is pleased to announce the launch of a new Facebook group – The Financial Commissioner to encourage networking, promote education and increase market knowledge among retail FX traders.

The Financial Commissioner is designed for the sensible Forex trader of all skill types – from novice to advanced. Retail FX traders and Facebook users can now network amongst each other and share their trading experiences and issues, receive free valuable FX market educational materials, articles on market knowledge and trading best practices, as well as opinions from industry experts and industry alerts.

 

 

The Commission continues to focus on trader education and market knowledge for all participants. In joining the Financial Commissioner group existing traders and those who simply are just thinking about trading Forex can ask questions to other group members and interact in a professional and cordial online space. Financial Commission professionals and experts are also on hand to answer questions on a variety of topics. This way all Facebook users can get unbiased and transparent information and opinions on the Forex market with no marketing or sales gimmicks.

In introducing the new social media group, the Commission has published free access to educational tutorials and ebooks for FX and CFD trading. These materials, along with many others will always be available to group members free of charge. Active traders can also benefit from the Commission’s complementary dispute resolution services. To see if your broker works with the Commission on resolving disputes, please check our Members page.

To find out more on how the Financial Commission helps retail Forex traders, please send us a message at info@financialcommission.org.
